   22: %%%----------------------------------------------------------------------
   23: -module(ejabberd_SUITE).
   24: -compile(export_all).
   25: 
   26: -import(suite, [init_config/1, connect/1, disconnect/1, recv_message/1,
   27:                 recv/1, recv_presence/1, send/2, send_recv/2, my_jid/1,
   28: 		server_jid/1, pubsub_jid/1, proxy_jid/1, muc_jid/1,
   29: 		muc_room_jid/1, my_muc_jid/1, peer_muc_jid/1,
   30: 		mix_jid/1, mix_room_jid/1, get_features/2, recv_iq/1,
   31: 		re_register/1, is_feature_advertised/2, subscribe_to_events/1,
   32:                 is_feature_advertised/3, set_opt/3,
   33: 		auth_SASL/2, auth_SASL/3, auth_SASL/4,
   34:                 wait_for_master/1, wait_for_slave/1, flush/1,
   35:                 make_iq_result/1, start_event_relay/0, alt_room_jid/1,
   36:                 stop_event_relay/1, put_event/2, get_event/1,
   37:                 bind/1, auth/1, auth/2, open_session/1, open_session/2,
   38: 		zlib/1, starttls/1, starttls/2, close_socket/1, init_stream/1,
   39: 		auth_legacy/2, auth_legacy/3, tcp_connect/1, send_text/2,
   40: 		set_roster/3, del_roster/1]).
   41: -include("suite.hrl").
   42: 
   43: suite() ->
   44:     [{timetrap, {seconds, 120}}].
   45: 
   46: init_per_suite(Config) ->
   47:     NewConfig = init_config(Config),
   48:     DataDir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, NewConfig),
   49:     {ok, CWD} = file:get_cwd(),
   50:     ExtAuthScript = filename:join([DataDir, "extauth.py"]),
   51:     LDIFFile = filename:join([DataDir, "ejabberd.ldif"]),
   52:     {ok, _} = file:copy(ExtAuthScript, filename:join([CWD, "extauth.py"])),
   53:     {ok, _} = ldap_srv:start(LDIFFile),
   54:     inet_db:add_host({127,0,0,1}, [binary_to_list(?S2S_VHOST),
   55: 				   binary_to_list(?MNESIA_VHOST),
   56: 				   binary_to_list(?UPLOAD_VHOST)]),
   57:     inet_db:set_domain(binary_to_list(p1_rand:get_string())),
   58:     inet_db:set_lookup([file, native]),
   59:     start_ejabberd(NewConfig),
   60:     NewConfig.
   61: 
   62: start_ejabberd(_) ->
   63:     {ok, _} = application:ensure_all_started(ejabberd, transient).
   64: 
   65: end_per_suite(_Config) ->
   66:     application:stop(ejabberd).
   67: 
   68: init_per_group(Group, Config) ->
   69:     case lists:member(Group, ?BACKENDS) of
   70:         false ->
   71:             %% Not a backend related group, do default init:
   72:             do_init_per_group(Group, Config);
   73:         true ->
   74:             case proplists:get_value(backends, Config) of
   75:                 all ->
   76:                     %% All backends enabled
   77:                     do_init_per_group(Group, Config);
   78:                 Backends ->
   79:                     %% Skipped backends that were not explicitely enabled
   80: 		    case lists:member(Group, Backends) of
   81: 			true ->
   82: 			    do_init_per_group(Group, Config);
   83: 			false ->
   84: 			    {skip, {disabled_backend, Group}}
   85: 		    end
   86:             end
   87:     end.
   88: 
   89: do_init_per_group(no_db, Config) ->
   90:     re_register(Config),
   91:     set_opt(persistent_room, false, Config);
   92: do_init_per_group(mnesia, Config) ->
   93:     mod_muc:shutdown_rooms(?MNESIA_VHOST),
   94:     set_opt(server, ?MNESIA_VHOST, Config);
   95: do_init_per_group(redis, Config) ->
   96:     mod_muc:shutdown_rooms(?REDIS_VHOST),
   97:     set_opt(server, ?REDIS_VHOST, Config);
   98: do_init_per_group(mysql, Config) ->
   99:     case catch ejabberd_sql:sql_query(?MYSQL_VHOST, [<<"select 1;">>]) of
  100:         {selected, _, _} ->
  101:             mod_muc:shutdown_rooms(?MYSQL_VHOST),
  102:             clear_sql_tables(mysql, ?config(base_dir, Config)),
  103:             set_opt(server, ?MYSQL_VHOST, Config);
  104:         Err ->
  105:             {skip, {mysql_not_available, Err}}
  106:     end;
  107: do_init_per_group(mssql, Config) ->
  108:     case catch ejabberd_sql:sql_query(?MSSQL_VHOST, [<<"select 1;">>]) of
  109:         {selected, _, _} ->
  110:             mod_muc:shutdown_rooms(?MSSQL_VHOST),
  111:             clear_sql_tables(mssql, ?config(base_dir, Config)),
  112:             set_opt(server, ?MSSQL_VHOST, Config);
  113:         Err ->
  114:             {skip, {mssql_not_available, Err}}
  115:     end;
  116: do_init_per_group(pgsql, Config) ->
  117:     case catch ejabberd_sql:sql_query(?PGSQL_VHOST, [<<"select 1;">>]) of
  118:         {selected, _, _} ->
  119:             mod_muc:shutdown_rooms(?PGSQL_VHOST),
  120:             clear_sql_tables(pgsql, ?config(base_dir, Config)),
  121:             set_opt(server, ?PGSQL_VHOST, Config);
  122:         Err ->
  123:             {skip, {pgsql_not_available, Err}}
  124:     end;
  125: do_init_per_group(sqlite, Config) ->
  126:     case catch ejabberd_sql:sql_query(?SQLITE_VHOST, [<<"select 1;">>]) of
  127:         {selected, _, _} ->
  128:             mod_muc:shutdown_rooms(?SQLITE_VHOST),
  129:             set_opt(server, ?SQLITE_VHOST, Config);
  130:         Err ->
  131:             {skip, {sqlite_not_available, Err}}
  132:     end;
  133: do_init_per_group(ldap, Config) ->
  134:     set_opt(server, ?LDAP_VHOST, Config);
  135: do_init_per_group(extauth, Config) ->
  136:     set_opt(server, ?EXTAUTH_VHOST, Config);
  137: do_init_per_group(s2s, Config) ->
  138:     ejabberd_config:set_option({s2s_use_starttls, ?COMMON_VHOST}, required),
  139:     ejabberd_config:set_option(ca_file, "ca.pem"),
  140:     Port = ?config(s2s_port, Config),
  141:     set_opt(server, ?COMMON_VHOST,
  142: 	    set_opt(xmlns, ?NS_SERVER,
  143: 		    set_opt(type, server,
  144: 			    set_opt(server_port, Port,
  145: 				    set_opt(stream_from, ?S2S_VHOST,
  146: 					    set_opt(lang, <<"">>, Config))))));
  147: do_init_per_group(component, Config) ->
  148:     Server = ?config(server, Config),
  149:     Port = ?config(component_port, Config),
  150:     set_opt(xmlns, ?NS_COMPONENT,
  151:             set_opt(server, <<"component.", Server/binary>>,
  152:                     set_opt(type, component,
  153:                             set_opt(server_port, Port,
  154:                                     set_opt(stream_version, undefined,
  155:                                             set_opt(lang, <<"">>, Config))))));
  156: do_init_per_group(GroupName, Config) ->
  157:     Pid = start_event_relay(),
  158:     NewConfig = set_opt(event_relay, Pid, Config),
  159:     case GroupName of
  160: 	anonymous -> set_opt(anonymous, true, NewConfig);
  161: 	_ -> NewConfig
  162:     end.
  163: 
  164: end_per_group(mnesia, _Config) ->
  165:     ok;
  166: end_per_group(redis, _Config) ->
  167:     ok;
  168: end_per_group(mysql, _Config) ->
  169:     ok;
  170: end_per_group(mssql, _Config) ->
  171:     ok;
  172: end_per_group(pgsql, _Config) ->
  173:     ok;
  174: end_per_group(sqlite, _Config) ->
  175:     ok;
  176: end_per_group(no_db, _Config) ->
  177:     ok;
  178: end_per_group(ldap, _Config) ->
  179:     ok;
  180: end_per_group(extauth, _Config) ->
  181:     ok;
  182: end_per_group(component, _Config) ->
  183:     ok;
  184: end_per_group(s2s, Config) ->
  185:     Server = ?config(server, Config),
  186:     ejabberd_config:set_option({s2s_use_starttls, Server}, false);
  187: end_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
  188:     stop_event_relay(Config),
  189:     set_opt(anonymous, false, Config).
  190: 
  191: init_per_testcase(stop_ejabberd, Config) ->
  192:     NewConfig = set_opt(resource, <<"">>,
  193: 			set_opt(anonymous, true, Config)),
  194:     open_session(bind(auth(connect(NewConfig))));
  195: init_per_testcase(TestCase, OrigConfig) ->
  196:     ct:print(80, "Testcase '~p' starting", [TestCase]),
  197:     Test = atom_to_list(TestCase),
  198:     IsMaster = lists:suffix("_master", Test),
  199:     IsSlave = lists:suffix("_slave", Test),
  200:     if IsMaster or IsSlave ->
  201: 	    subscribe_to_events(OrigConfig);
  202:        true ->
  203: 	    ok
  204:     end,
  205:     TestGroup = proplists:get_value(
  206: 		  name, ?config(tc_group_properties, OrigConfig)),
  207:     Server = ?config(server, OrigConfig),
  208:     Resource = case TestGroup of
  209: 		   anonymous ->
  210: 		       <<"">>;
  211: 		   legacy_auth ->
  212: 		       p1_rand:get_string();
  213: 		   _ ->
  214: 		       ?config(resource, OrigConfig)
  215: 	       end,
  216:     MasterResource = ?config(master_resource, OrigConfig),
  217:     SlaveResource = ?config(slave_resource, OrigConfig),
  218:     Mode = if IsSlave -> slave;
  219: 	      IsMaster -> master;
  220: 	      true -> single
  221: 	   end,
  222:     IsCarbons = lists:prefix("carbons_", Test),
  223:     IsReplaced = lists:prefix("replaced_", Test),
  224:     User = if IsReplaced -> <<"test_single!#$%^*()`~+-;_=[]{}|\\">>;
  225: 	      IsCarbons and not (IsMaster or IsSlave) ->
  226: 		   <<"test_single!#$%^*()`~+-;_=[]{}|\\">>;
  227: 	      IsMaster or IsCarbons -> <<"test_master!#$%^*()`~+-;_=[]{}|\\">>;
  228:               IsSlave -> <<"test_slave!#$%^*()`~+-;_=[]{}|\\">>;
  229:               true -> <<"test_single!#$%^*()`~+-;_=[]{}|\\">>
  230:            end,
  231:     Nick = if IsSlave -> ?config(slave_nick, OrigConfig);
  232: 	      IsMaster -> ?config(master_nick, OrigConfig);
  233: 	      true -> ?config(nick, OrigConfig)
  234: 	   end,
  235:     MyResource = if IsMaster and IsCarbons -> MasterResource;
  236: 		    IsSlave and IsCarbons -> SlaveResource;
  237: 		    true -> Resource
  238: 		 end,
  239:     Slave = if IsCarbons ->
  240: 		    jid:make(<<"test_master!#$%^*()`~+-;_=[]{}|\\">>, Server, SlaveResource);
  241: 	       IsReplaced ->
  242: 		    jid:make(User, Server, Resource);
  243: 	       true ->
  244: 		    jid:make(<<"test_slave!#$%^*()`~+-;_=[]{}|\\">>, Server, Resource)
  245: 	    end,
  246:     Master = if IsCarbons ->
  247: 		     jid:make(<<"test_master!#$%^*()`~+-;_=[]{}|\\">>, Server, MasterResource);
  248: 		IsReplaced ->
  249: 		     jid:make(User, Server, Resource);
  250: 		true ->
  251: 		     jid:make(<<"test_master!#$%^*()`~+-;_=[]{}|\\">>, Server, Resource)
  252: 	     end,
  253:     Config1 = set_opt(user, User,
  254: 		      set_opt(slave, Slave,
  255: 			      set_opt(master, Master,
  256: 				      set_opt(resource, MyResource,
  257: 					      set_opt(nick, Nick,
  258: 						      set_opt(mode, Mode, OrigConfig)))))),
  259:     Config2 = if IsSlave ->
  260: 		      set_opt(peer_nick, ?config(master_nick, Config1), Config1);
  261: 		 IsMaster ->
  262: 		      set_opt(peer_nick, ?config(slave_nick, Config1), Config1);
  263: 		 true ->
  264: 		      Config1
  265: 	      end,
  266:     Config = if IsSlave -> set_opt(peer, Master, Config2);
  267: 		IsMaster -> set_opt(peer, Slave, Config2);
  268: 		true -> Config2
  269: 	     end,
  270:     case Test of
  271:         "test_connect" ++ _ ->
  272:             Config;
  273:         "webadmin_" ++ _ ->
  274:             Config;
  275: 	"test_legacy_auth_feature" ->
  276: 	    connect(Config);
  277: 	"test_legacy_auth" ++ _ ->
  278: 	    init_stream(set_opt(stream_version, undefined, Config));
  279:         "test_auth" ++ _ ->
  280:             connect(Config);
  281:         "test_starttls" ++ _ ->
  282:             connect(Config);
  283:         "test_zlib" ->
  284:             auth(connect(starttls(connect(Config))));
  285:         "test_register" ->
  286:             connect(Config);
  287:         "auth_md5" ->
  288:             connect(Config);
  289:         "auth_plain" ->
  290:             connect(Config);
  291: 	"auth_external" ++ _ ->
  292: 	    connect(Config);
  293: 	"unauthenticated_" ++ _ ->
  294: 	    connect(Config);
  295:         "test_bind" ->
  296:             auth(connect(Config));
  297: 	"sm_resume" ->
  298: 	    auth(connect(Config));
  299: 	"sm_resume_failed" ->
  300: 	    auth(connect(Config));
  301:         "test_open_session" ->
  302:             bind(auth(connect(Config)));
  303: 	"replaced" ++ _ ->
  304: 	    auth(connect(Config));
  305:         _ when IsMaster or IsSlave ->
  306:             Password = ?config(password, Config),
  307:             ejabberd_auth:try_register(User, Server, Password),
  308:             open_session(bind(auth(connect(Config))));
  309: 	_ when TestGroup == s2s_tests ->
  310: 	    auth(connect(starttls(connect(Config))));
  311:         _ ->
  312:             open_session(bind(auth(connect(Config))))
  313:     end.
  314: 
  315: end_per_testcase(_TestCase, _Config) ->
  316:     ok.
  317: 
  318: legacy_auth_tests() ->
  319:     {legacy_auth, [parallel],
  320:      [test_legacy_auth_feature,
  321:       test_legacy_auth,
  322:       test_legacy_auth_digest,
  323:       test_legacy_auth_no_resource,
  324:       test_legacy_auth_bad_jid,
  325:       test_legacy_auth_fail]}.
  326: 
  327: no_db_tests() ->
  328:     [{anonymous, [parallel],
  329:       [test_connect_bad_xml,
  330:        test_connect_unexpected_xml,
  331:        test_connect_unknown_ns,
  332:        test_connect_bad_xmlns,
  333:        test_connect_bad_ns_stream,
  334:        test_connect_bad_lang,
  335:        test_connect_bad_to,
  336:        test_connect_missing_to,
  337:        test_connect,
  338:        unauthenticated_iq,
  339:        unauthenticated_message,
  340:        unauthenticated_presence,
  341:        test_starttls,
  342:        test_auth,
  343:        test_zlib,
  344:        test_bind,
  345:        test_open_session,
  346:        codec_failure,
  347:        unsupported_query,
  348:        bad_nonza,
  349:        invalid_from,
  350:        ping,
  351:        version,
  352:        time,
  353:        stats,
  354:        disco]},
  355:      {presence_and_s2s, [sequence],
  356:       [test_auth_fail,
  357:        presence,
  358:        s2s_dialback,
  359:        s2s_optional,
  360:        s2s_required]},
  361:      auth_external,
  362:      auth_external_no_jid,
  363:      auth_external_no_user,
  364:      auth_external_malformed_jid,
  365:      auth_external_wrong_jid,
  366:      auth_external_wrong_server,
  367:      auth_external_invalid_cert,
  368:      jidprep_tests:single_cases(),
  369:      sm_tests:single_cases(),
  370:      sm_tests:master_slave_cases(),
  371:      muc_tests:single_cases(),
  372:      muc_tests:master_slave_cases(),
  373:      proxy65_tests:single_cases(),
  374:      proxy65_tests:master_slave_cases(),
  375:      stundisco_tests:single_cases(),
  376:      replaced_tests:master_slave_cases(),
  377:      upload_tests:single_cases(),
  378:      carbons_tests:single_cases(),
  379:      carbons_tests:master_slave_cases()].
  380: 
  381: db_tests(DB) when DB == mnesia; DB == redis ->
  382:     [{single_user, [sequence],
  383:       [test_register,
  384:        legacy_auth_tests(),
  385:        auth_plain,
  386:        auth_md5,
  387:        presence_broadcast,
  388:        last,
  389:        webadmin_tests:single_cases(),
  390:        roster_tests:single_cases(),
  391:        private_tests:single_cases(),
  392:        privacy_tests:single_cases(),
  393:        vcard_tests:single_cases(),
  394:        pubsub_tests:single_cases(),
  395:        muc_tests:single_cases(),
  396:        offline_tests:single_cases(),
  397:        mam_tests:single_cases(),
  398:        csi_tests:single_cases(),
  399:        push_tests:single_cases(),
  400:        test_unregister]},
  401:      muc_tests:master_slave_cases(),
  402:      privacy_tests:master_slave_cases(),
  403:      pubsub_tests:master_slave_cases(),
  404:      roster_tests:master_slave_cases(),
  405:      offline_tests:master_slave_cases(DB),
  406:      mam_tests:master_slave_cases(),
  407:      vcard_tests:master_slave_cases(),
  408:      announce_tests:master_slave_cases(),
  409:      csi_tests:master_slave_cases(),
  410:      push_tests:master_slave_cases()];
  411: db_tests(DB) ->
  412:     [{single_user, [sequence],
  413:       [test_register,
  414:        legacy_auth_tests(),
  415:        auth_plain,
  416:        auth_md5,
  417:        presence_broadcast,
  418:        last,
  419:        webadmin_tests:single_cases(),
  420:        roster_tests:single_cases(),
  421:        private_tests:single_cases(),
  422:        privacy_tests:single_cases(),
  423:        vcard_tests:single_cases(),
  424:        pubsub_tests:single_cases(),
  425:        muc_tests:single_cases(),
  426:        offline_tests:single_cases(),
  427:        mam_tests:single_cases(),
  428:        push_tests:single_cases(),
  429:        test_unregister]},
  430:      muc_tests:master_slave_cases(),
  431:      privacy_tests:master_slave_cases(),
  432:      pubsub_tests:master_slave_cases(),
  433:      roster_tests:master_slave_cases(),
  434:      offline_tests:master_slave_cases(DB),
  435:      mam_tests:master_slave_cases(),
  436:      vcard_tests:master_slave_cases(),
  437:      announce_tests:master_slave_cases(),
  438:      push_tests:master_slave_cases()].
  439: 
  440: ldap_tests() ->
  441:     [{ldap_tests, [sequence],
  442:       [test_auth,
  443:        test_auth_fail,
  444:        vcard_get,
  445:        ldap_shared_roster_get]}].
  446: 
  447: extauth_tests() ->
  448:     [{extauth_tests, [sequence],
  449:       [test_auth,
  450:        test_auth_fail,
  451:        test_unregister]}].
  452: 
  453: component_tests() ->
  454:     [{component_connect, [parallel],
  455:       [test_connect_bad_xml,
  456:        test_connect_unexpected_xml,
  457:        test_connect_unknown_ns,
  458:        test_connect_bad_xmlns,
  459:        test_connect_bad_ns_stream,
  460:        test_connect_missing_to,
  461:        test_connect,
  462:        test_auth,
  463:        test_auth_fail]},
  464:      {component_tests, [sequence],
  465:       [test_missing_from,
  466:        test_missing_to,
  467:        test_invalid_from,
  468:        test_component_send,
  469:        bad_nonza,
  470:        codec_failure]}].
  471: 
  472: s2s_tests() ->
  473:     [{s2s_connect, [parallel],
  474:       [test_connect_bad_xml,
  475:        test_connect_unexpected_xml,
  476:        test_connect_unknown_ns,
  477:        test_connect_bad_xmlns,
  478:        test_connect_bad_ns_stream,
  479:        test_connect,
  480:        test_connect_s2s_starttls_required,
  481:        test_starttls,
  482:        test_connect_s2s_unauthenticated_iq,
  483:        test_auth_starttls]},
  484:      {s2s_tests, [sequence],
  485:       [test_missing_from,
  486:        test_missing_to,
  487:        test_invalid_from,
  488:        bad_nonza,
  489:        codec_failure]}].
  490: 
  491: groups() ->
  492:     [{ldap, [sequence], ldap_tests()},
  493:      {extauth, [sequence], extauth_tests()},
  494:      {no_db, [sequence], no_db_tests()},
  495:      {component, [sequence], component_tests()},
  496:      {s2s, [sequence], s2s_tests()},
  497:      {mnesia, [sequence], db_tests(mnesia)},
  498:      {redis, [sequence], db_tests(redis)},
  499:      {mysql, [sequence], db_tests(mysql)},
  500:      {mssql, [sequence], db_tests(mssql)},
  501:      {pgsql, [sequence], db_tests(pgsql)},
  502:      {sqlite, [sequence], db_tests(sqlite)}].
  503: 
  504: all() ->
  505:     [{group, ldap},
  506:      {group, no_db},
  507:      {group, mnesia},
  508:      {group, redis},
  509:      {group, mysql},
  510:      {group, mssql},
  511:      {group, pgsql},
  512:      {group, sqlite},
  513:      {group, extauth},
  514:      {group, component},
  515:      {group, s2s},
  516:      stop_ejabberd].
  517: 
  518: stop_ejabberd(Config) ->
  519:     ok = application:stop(ejabberd),
  520:     ?recv1(#stream_error{reason = 'system-shutdown'}),
  521:     case suite:recv(Config) of
  522:         {xmlstreamend, <<"stream:stream">>} ->
  523:             ok;
  524:         closed ->
  525:             ok;
  526:         Other ->
  527:             suite:match_failure([Other], [closed])
  528:     end,
  529:     Config.
  530: 
  531: test_connect_bad_xml(Config) ->
  532:     Config0 = tcp_connect(Config),
  533:     send_text(Config0, <<"<'/>">>),
  534:     Version = ?config(stream_version, Config0),
  535:     ?recv1(#stream_start{version = Version}),
  536:     ?recv1(#stream_error{reason = 'not-well-formed'}),
  537:     ?recv1({xmlstreamend, <<"stream:stream">>}),
  538:     close_socket(Config0).
  539: 
  540: test_connect_unexpected_xml(Config) ->
  541:     Config0 = tcp_connect(Config),
  542:     send(Config0, #caps{}),
  543:     Version = ?config(stream_version, Config0),
  544:     ?recv1(#stream_start{version = Version}),
  545:     ?recv1(#stream_error{reason = 'invalid-xml'}),
  546:     ?recv1({xmlstreamend, <<"stream:stream">>}),
  547:     close_socket(Config0).
  548: 
  549: test_connect_unknown_ns(Config) ->
  550:     Config0 = init_stream(set_opt(xmlns, <<"wrong">>, Config)),
  551:     ?recv1(#stream_error{reason = 'invalid-xml'}),
  552:     ?recv1({xmlstreamend, <<"stream:stream">>}),
  553:     close_socket(Config0).
  554: 
  555: test_connect_bad_xmlns(Config) ->
  556:     NS = case ?config(type, Config) of
  557: 	     client -> ?NS_SERVER;
  558: 	     _ -> ?NS_CLIENT
  559: 	 end,
  560:     Config0 = init_stream(set_opt(xmlns, NS, Config)),
  561:     ?recv1(#stream_error{reason = 'invalid-namespace'}),
  562:     ?recv1({xmlstreamend, <<"stream:stream">>}),
  563:     close_socket(Config0).
  564: 
  565: test_connect_bad_ns_stream(Config) ->
  566:     Config0 = init_stream(set_opt(ns_stream, <<"wrong">>, Config)),
  567:     ?recv1(#stream_error{reason = 'invalid-namespace'}),
  568:     ?recv1({xmlstreamend, <<"stream:stream">>}),
  569:     close_socket(Config0).
  570: 
  571: test_connect_bad_lang(Config) ->
  572:     Lang = iolist_to_binary(lists:duplicate(36, $x)),
  573:     Config0 = init_stream(set_opt(lang, Lang, Config)),
  574:     ?recv1(#stream_error{reason = 'invalid-xml'}),
  575:     ?recv1({xmlstreamend, <<"stream:stream">>}),
  576:     close_socket(Config0).
  577: 
  578: test_connect_bad_to(Config) ->
  579:     Config0 = init_stream(set_opt(server, <<"wrong.com">>, Config)),
  580:     ?recv1(#stream_error{reason = 'host-unknown'}),
  581:     ?recv1({xmlstreamend, <<"stream:stream">>}),
  582:     close_socket(Config0).
  583: 
  584: test_connect_missing_to(Config) ->
  585:     Config0 = init_stream(set_opt(server, <<"">>, Config)),
  586:     ?recv1(#stream_error{reason = 'improper-addressing'}),
  587:     ?recv1({xmlstreamend, <<"stream:stream">>}),
  588:     close_socket(Config0).
  589: 
  590: test_connect(Config) ->
  591:     disconnect(connect(Config)).
  592: 
  593: test_connect_s2s_starttls_required(Config) ->
  594:     Config1 = connect(Config),
  595:     send(Config1, #presence{}),
  596:     ?recv1(#stream_error{reason = 'policy-violation'}),
  597:     ?recv1({xmlstreamend, <<"stream:stream">>}),
  598:     close_socket(Config1).
  599: 
  600: test_connect_s2s_unauthenticated_iq(Config) ->
  601:     Config1 = connect(starttls(connect(Config))),
  602:     unauthenticated_iq(Config1).
  603: 
  604: test_starttls(Config) ->
  605:     case ?config(starttls, Config) of
  606:         true ->
  607:             disconnect(connect(starttls(Config)));
  608:         _ ->
  609:             {skipped, 'starttls_not_available'}
  610:     end.
  611: 
  612: test_zlib(Config) ->
  613:     case ?config(compression, Config) of
  614:         [_|_] = Ms ->
  615:             case lists:member(<<"zlib">>, Ms) of
  616:                 true ->
  617:                     disconnect(zlib(Config));
  618:                 false ->
  619:                     {skipped, 'zlib_not_available'}
  620:             end;
  621:         _ ->
  622:             {skipped, 'compression_not_available'}
  623:     end.
  624: 
  625: test_register(Config) ->
  626:     case ?config(register, Config) of
  627:         true ->
  628:             disconnect(register(Config));
  629:         _ ->
  630:             {skipped, 'registration_not_available'}
  631:     end.
  632: 
  633: register(Config) ->
  634:     #iq{type = result,
  635:         sub_els = [#register{username = <<>>,
  636:                              password = <<>>}]} =
  637:         send_recv(Config, #iq{type = get, to = server_jid(Config),
  638:                               sub_els = [#register{}]}),
  639:     #iq{type = result, sub_els = []} =
  640:         send_recv(
  641:           Config,
  642:           #iq{type = set,
  643:               sub_els = [#register{username = ?config(user, Config),
  644:                                    password = ?config(password, Config)}]}),
  645:     Config.
  646: 
  647: test_unregister(Config) ->
  648:     case ?config(register, Config) of
  649:         true ->
  650:             try_unregister(Config);
  651:         _ ->
  652:             {skipped, 'registration_not_available'}
  653:     end.
  654: 
  655: try_unregister(Config) ->
  656:     true = is_feature_advertised(Config, ?NS_REGISTER),
  657:     #iq{type = result, sub_els = []} =
  658:         send_recv(
  659:           Config,
  660:           #iq{type = set,
  661:               sub_els = [#register{remove = true}]}),
  662:     ?recv1(#stream_error{reason = conflict}),
  663:     Config.
  664: 
  665: unauthenticated_presence(Config) ->
  666:     unauthenticated_packet(Config, #presence{}).
  667: 
  668: unauthenticated_message(Config) ->
  669:     unauthenticated_packet(Config, #message{}).
  670: 
  671: unauthenticated_iq(Config) ->
  672:     IQ = #iq{type = get, sub_els = [#disco_info{}]},
  673:     unauthenticated_packet(Config, IQ).
  674: 
  675: unauthenticated_packet(Config, Pkt) ->
  676:     From = my_jid(Config),
  677:     To = server_jid(Config),
  678:     send(Config, xmpp:set_from_to(Pkt, From, To)),
  679:     #stream_error{reason = 'not-authorized'} = recv(Config),
  680:     {xmlstreamend, <<"stream:stream">>} = recv(Config),
  681:     close_socket(Config).
  682: 
  683: bad_nonza(Config) ->
  684:     %% Unsupported and invalid nonza should be silently dropped.
  685:     send(Config, #caps{}),
  686:     send(Config, #stanza_error{type = wrong}),
  687:     disconnect(Config).
  688: 
  689: invalid_from(Config) ->
  690:     send(Config, #message{from = jid:make(p1_rand:get_string())}),
  691:     ?recv1(#stream_error{reason = 'invalid-from'}),
  692:     ?recv1({xmlstreamend, <<"stream:stream">>}),
  693:     close_socket(Config).
  694: 
  695: test_missing_from(Config) ->
  696:     Server = server_jid(Config),
  697:     send(Config, #message{to = Server}),
  698:     ?recv1(#stream_error{reason = 'improper-addressing'}),
  699:     ?recv1({xmlstreamend, <<"stream:stream">>}),
  700:     close_socket(Config).
  701: 
  702: test_missing_to(Config) ->
  703:     Server = server_jid(Config),
  704:     send(Config, #message{from = Server}),
  705:     ?recv1(#stream_error{reason = 'improper-addressing'}),
  706:     ?recv1({xmlstreamend, <<"stream:stream">>}),
  707:     close_socket(Config).
  708: 
  709: test_invalid_from(Config) ->
  710:     From = jid:make(p1_rand:get_string()),
  711:     To = jid:make(p1_rand:get_string()),
  712:     send(Config, #message{from = From, to = To}),
  713:     ?recv1(#stream_error{reason = 'invalid-from'}),
  714:     ?recv1({xmlstreamend, <<"stream:stream">>}),
  715:     close_socket(Config).
  716: 
  717: test_component_send(Config) ->
  718:     To = jid:make(?COMMON_VHOST),
  719:     From = server_jid(Config),
  720:     #iq{type = result, from = To, to = From} =
  721: 	send_recv(Config, #iq{type = get, to = To, from = From,
  722: 			      sub_els = [#ping{}]}),
  723:     disconnect(Config).
  724: 
  725: s2s_dialback(Config) ->
  726:     Server = ?config(server, Config),
  727:     ejabberd_s2s:stop_s2s_connections(),
  728:     ejabberd_config:set_option({s2s_use_starttls, Server}, false),
  729:     ejabberd_config:set_option({s2s_use_starttls, ?MNESIA_VHOST}, false),
  730:     ejabberd_config:set_option(ca_file, pkix:get_cafile()),
  731:     s2s_ping(Config).
  732: 
  733: s2s_optional(Config) ->
  734:     Server = ?config(server, Config),
  735:     ejabberd_s2s:stop_s2s_connections(),
  736:     ejabberd_config:set_option({s2s_use_starttls, Server}, optional),
  737:     ejabberd_config:set_option({s2s_use_starttls, ?MNESIA_VHOST}, optional),
  738:     ejabberd_config:set_option(ca_file, pkix:get_cafile()),
  739:     s2s_ping(Config).
  740: 
  741: s2s_required(Config) ->
  742:     Server = ?config(server, Config),
  743:     ejabberd_s2s:stop_s2s_connections(),
  744:     gen_mod:stop_module(Server, mod_s2s_dialback),
  745:     gen_mod:stop_module(?MNESIA_VHOST, mod_s2s_dialback),
  746:     ejabberd_config:set_option({s2s_use_starttls, Server}, required),
  747:     ejabberd_config:set_option({s2s_use_starttls, ?MNESIA_VHOST}, required),
  748:     ejabberd_config:set_option(ca_file, "ca.pem"),
  749:     s2s_ping(Config).
  750: 
  751: s2s_ping(Config) ->
  752:     From = my_jid(Config),
  753:     To = jid:make(?MNESIA_VHOST),
  754:     ID = p1_rand:get_string(),
  755:     ejabberd_s2s:route(#iq{from = From, to = To, id = ID,
  756: 			   type = get, sub_els = [#ping{}]}),
  757:     #iq{type = result, id = ID, sub_els = []} = recv_iq(Config),
  758:     disconnect(Config).
  759: 
  760: auth_md5(Config) ->
  761:     Mechs = ?config(mechs, Config),
  762:     case lists:member(<<"DIGEST-MD5">>, Mechs) of
  763:         true ->
  764:             disconnect(auth_SASL(<<"DIGEST-MD5">>, Config));
  765:         false ->
  766:             disconnect(Config),
  767:             {skipped, 'DIGEST-MD5_not_available'}
  768:     end.
  769: 
  770: auth_plain(Config) ->
  771:     Mechs = ?config(mechs, Config),
  772:     case lists:member(<<"PLAIN">>, Mechs) of
  773:         true ->
  774:             disconnect(auth_SASL(<<"PLAIN">>, Config));
  775:         false ->
  776:             disconnect(Config),
  777:             {skipped, 'PLAIN_not_available'}
  778:     end.
  779: 
  780: auth_external(Config0) ->
  781:     Config = connect(starttls(Config0)),
  782:     disconnect(auth_SASL(<<"EXTERNAL">>, Config)).
  783: 
  784: auth_external_no_jid(Config0) ->
  785:     Config = connect(starttls(Config0)),
  786:     disconnect(auth_SASL(<<"EXTERNAL">>, Config, _ShoudFail = false,
  787: 			 {<<"">>, <<"">>, <<"">>})).
  788: 
  789: auth_external_no_user(Config0) ->
  790:     Config = set_opt(user, <<"">>, connect(starttls(Config0))),
  791:     disconnect(auth_SASL(<<"EXTERNAL">>, Config)).
  792: 
  793: auth_external_malformed_jid(Config0) ->
  794:     Config = connect(starttls(Config0)),
  795:     disconnect(auth_SASL(<<"EXTERNAL">>, Config, _ShouldFail = true,
  796: 			 {<<"">>, <<"@">>, <<"">>})).
  797: 
  798: auth_external_wrong_jid(Config0) ->
  799:     Config = set_opt(user, <<"wrong">>,
  800: 		     connect(starttls(Config0))),
  801:     disconnect(auth_SASL(<<"EXTERNAL">>, Config, _ShouldFail = true)).
  802: 
  803: auth_external_wrong_server(Config0) ->
  804:     Config = connect(starttls(Config0)),
  805:     disconnect(auth_SASL(<<"EXTERNAL">>, Config, _ShouldFail = true,
  806: 			 {<<"">>, <<"wrong.com">>, <<"">>})).
  807: 
  808: auth_external_invalid_cert(Config0) ->
  809:     Config = connect(starttls(
  810: 		       set_opt(certfile, "self-signed-cert.pem", Config0))),
  811:     disconnect(auth_SASL(<<"EXTERNAL">>, Config, _ShouldFail = true)).
  812: 
  813: test_legacy_auth_feature(Config) ->
  814:     true = ?config(legacy_auth, Config),
  815:     disconnect(Config).
  816: 
  817: test_legacy_auth(Config) ->
  818:     disconnect(auth_legacy(Config, _Digest = false)).
  819: 
  820: test_legacy_auth_digest(Config) ->
  821:     disconnect(auth_legacy(Config, _Digest = true)).
  822: 
  823: test_legacy_auth_no_resource(Config0) ->
  824:     Config = set_opt(resource, <<"">>, Config0),
  825:     disconnect(auth_legacy(Config, _Digest = false, _ShouldFail = true)).
  826: 
  827: test_legacy_auth_bad_jid(Config0) ->
  828:     Config = set_opt(user, <<"@">>, Config0),
  829:     disconnect(auth_legacy(Config, _Digest = false, _ShouldFail = true)).
  830: 
  831: test_legacy_auth_fail(Config0) ->
  832:     Config = set_opt(user, <<"wrong">>, Config0),
  833:     disconnect(auth_legacy(Config, _Digest = false, _ShouldFail = true)).
  834: 
  835: test_auth(Config) ->
  836:     disconnect(auth(Config)).
  837: 
  838: test_auth_starttls(Config) ->
  839:     disconnect(auth(connect(starttls(Config)))).
  840: 
  841: test_auth_fail(Config0) ->
  842:     Config = set_opt(user, <<"wrong">>,
  843: 		     set_opt(password, <<"wrong">>, Config0)),
  844:     disconnect(auth(Config, _ShouldFail = true)).
  845: 
  846: test_bind(Config) ->
  847:     disconnect(bind(Config)).
  848: 
  849: test_open_session(Config) ->
  850:     disconnect(open_session(Config, true)).
  851: 
  852: codec_failure(Config) ->
  853:     JID = my_jid(Config),
  854:     #iq{type = error} =
  855: 	send_recv(Config, #iq{type = wrong, from = JID, to = JID}),
  856:     disconnect(Config).
  857: 
  858: unsupported_query(Config) ->
  859:     ServerJID = server_jid(Config),
  860:     #iq{type = error} = send_recv(Config, #iq{type = get, to = ServerJID}),
  861:     #iq{type = error} = send_recv(Config, #iq{type = get, to = ServerJID,
  862: 					      sub_els = [#caps{}]}),
  863:     #iq{type = error} = send_recv(Config, #iq{type = get, to = ServerJID,
  864: 					      sub_els = [#roster_query{},
  865: 							 #disco_info{},
  866: 							 #privacy_query{}]}),
  867:     disconnect(Config).
  868: 
  869: presence(Config) ->
  870:     JID = my_jid(Config),
  871:     #presence{from = JID, to = JID} = send_recv(Config, #presence{}),
  872:     disconnect(Config).
  873: 
  874: presence_broadcast(Config) ->
  875:     Feature = <<"p1:tmp:", (p1_rand:get_string())/binary>>,
  876:     Ver = crypto:hash(sha, ["client", $/, "bot", $/, "en", $/,
  877:                             "ejabberd_ct", $<, Feature, $<]),
  878:     B64Ver = base64:encode(Ver),
  879:     Node = <<(?EJABBERD_CT_URI)/binary, $#, B64Ver/binary>>,
  880:     Server = ?config(server, Config),
  881:     Info = #disco_info{identities =
  882: 			   [#identity{category = <<"client">>,
  883: 				      type = <<"bot">>,
  884: 				      lang = <<"en">>,
  885: 				      name = <<"ejabberd_ct">>}],
  886: 		       node = Node, features = [Feature]},
  887:     Caps = #caps{hash = <<"sha-1">>, node = ?EJABBERD_CT_URI, version = B64Ver},
  888:     send(Config, #presence{sub_els = [Caps]}),
  889:     JID = my_jid(Config),
  890:     %% We receive:
  891:     %% 1) disco#info iq request for CAPS
  892:     %% 2) welcome message
  893:     %% 3) presence broadcast
  894:     IQ = #iq{type = get,
  895: 	     from = JID,
  896: 	     sub_els = [#disco_info{node = Node}]} = recv_iq(Config),
  897:     #message{type = normal} = recv_message(Config),
  898:     #presence{from = JID, to = JID} = recv_presence(Config),
  899:     send(Config, #iq{type = result, id = IQ#iq.id,
  900: 		     to = JID, sub_els = [Info]}),
  901:     %% We're trying to read our feature from ejabberd database
  902:     %% with exponential back-off as our IQ response may be delayed.
  903:     [Feature] =
  904: 	lists:foldl(
  905: 	  fun(Time, []) ->
  906: 		  timer:sleep(Time),
  907: 		  mod_caps:get_features(Server, Caps);
  908: 	     (_, Acc) ->
  909: 		  Acc
  910: 	  end, [], [0, 100, 200, 2000, 5000, 10000]),
  911:     disconnect(Config).
  912: 
  913: ping(Config) ->
  914:     true = is_feature_advertised(Config, ?NS_PING),
  915:     #iq{type = result, sub_els = []} =
  916:         send_recv(
  917:           Config,
  918:           #iq{type = get, sub_els = [#ping{}], to = server_jid(Config)}),
  919:     disconnect(Config).
  920: 
  921: version(Config) ->
  922:     true = is_feature_advertised(Config, ?NS_VERSION),
  923:     #iq{type = result, sub_els = [#version{}]} =
  924:         send_recv(
  925:           Config, #iq{type = get, sub_els = [#version{}],
  926:                       to = server_jid(Config)}),
  927:     disconnect(Config).
  928: 
  929: time(Config) ->
  930:     true = is_feature_advertised(Config, ?NS_TIME),
  931:     #iq{type = result, sub_els = [#time{}]} =
  932:         send_recv(Config, #iq{type = get, sub_els = [#time{}],
  933:                               to = server_jid(Config)}),
  934:     disconnect(Config).
  935: 
  936: disco(Config) ->
  937:     true = is_feature_advertised(Config, ?NS_DISCO_INFO),
  938:     true = is_feature_advertised(Config, ?NS_DISCO_ITEMS),
  939:     #iq{type = result, sub_els = [#disco_items{items = Items}]} =
  940:         send_recv(
  941:           Config, #iq{type = get, sub_els = [#disco_items{}],
  942:                       to = server_jid(Config)}),
  943:     lists:foreach(
  944:       fun(#disco_item{jid = JID, node = Node}) ->
  945:               #iq{type = result} =
  946:                   send_recv(Config,
  947:                             #iq{type = get, to = JID,
  948:                                 sub_els = [#disco_info{node = Node}]})
  949:       end, Items),
  950:     disconnect(Config).
  951: 
  952: last(Config) ->
  953:     true = is_feature_advertised(Config, ?NS_LAST),
  954:     #iq{type = result, sub_els = [#last{}]} =
  955:         send_recv(Config, #iq{type = get, sub_els = [#last{}],
  956:                               to = server_jid(Config)}),
  957:     disconnect(Config).
  958: 
  959: vcard_get(Config) ->
  960:     true = is_feature_advertised(Config, ?NS_VCARD),
  961:     %% TODO: check if VCard corresponds to LDIF data from ejabberd.ldif
  962:     #iq{type = result, sub_els = [_VCard]} =
  963:         send_recv(Config, #iq{type = get, sub_els = [#vcard_temp{}]}),
  964:     disconnect(Config).
  965: 
  966: ldap_shared_roster_get(Config) ->
  967:     Item = #roster_item{jid = jid:decode(<<"user2@ldap.localhost">>), name = <<"Test User 2">>,
  968:                         groups = [<<"group1">>], subscription = both},
  969:     #iq{type = result, sub_els = [#roster_query{items = [Item]}]} =
  970:         send_recv(Config, #iq{type = get, sub_els = [#roster_query{}]}),
  971:     disconnect(Config).
  972: 
  973: stats(Config) ->
  974:     #iq{type = result, sub_els = [#stats{list = Stats}]} =
  975:         send_recv(Config, #iq{type = get, sub_els = [#stats{}],
  976:                               to = server_jid(Config)}),
  977:     lists:foreach(
  978:       fun(#stat{} = Stat) ->
  979:               #iq{type = result, sub_els = [_|_]} =
  980:                   send_recv(Config, #iq{type = get,
  981:                                         sub_els = [#stats{list = [Stat]}],
  982:                                         to = server_jid(Config)})
  983:       end, Stats),
  984:     disconnect(Config).
  985: 
  986: %%%===================================================================
  987: %%% Aux functions
  988: %%%===================================================================
  989: bookmark_conference() ->
  990:     #bookmark_conference{name = <<"Some name">>,
  991:                          autojoin = true,
  992:                          jid = jid:make(
  993:                                  <<"some">>,
  994:                                  <<"some.conference.org">>,
  995:                                  <<>>)}.
  996: 
  997: '$handle_undefined_function'(F, [Config]) when is_list(Config) ->
  998:     case re:split(atom_to_list(F), "_", [{return, list}, {parts, 2}]) of
  999: 	[M, T] ->
 1000: 	    Module = list_to_atom(M ++ "_tests"),
 1001: 	    Function = list_to_atom(T),
 1002: 	    case erlang:function_exported(Module, Function, 1) of
 1003: 		true ->
 1004: 		    Module:Function(Config);
 1005: 		false ->
 1006: 		    erlang:error({undef, F})
 1007: 	    end;
 1008: 	_ ->
 1009: 	    erlang:error({undef, F})
 1010:     end;
 1011: '$handle_undefined_function'(_, _) ->
 1012:     erlang:error(undef).
 1013: 
 1014: %%%===================================================================
 1015: %%% SQL stuff
 1016: %%%===================================================================
 1017: clear_sql_tables(sqlite, _BaseDir) ->
 1018:     ok;
 1019: clear_sql_tables(Type, BaseDir) ->
 1020:     {VHost, File} = case Type of
 1021:                         mysql ->
 1022:                             Path = case ejabberd_sql:use_new_schema() of
 1023:                                 true ->
 1024:                                     "mysql.new.sql";
 1025:                                 false ->
 1026:                                     "mysql.sql"
 1027:                             end,
 1028:                             {?MYSQL_VHOST, Path};
 1029:                         mssql ->
 1030:                             Path = case ejabberd_sql:use_new_schema() of
 1031:                                 true ->
 1032:                                     "mssql.new.sql";
 1033:                                 false ->
 1034:                                     "mssql.sql"
 1035:                             end,
 1036:                             {?MSSQL_VHOST, Path};
 1037:                         pgsql ->
 1038:                             Path = case ejabberd_sql:use_new_schema() of
 1039:                                 true ->
 1040:                                     "pg.new.sql";
 1041:                                 false ->
 1042:                                     "pg.sql"
 1043:                             end,
 1044:                             {?PGSQL_VHOST, Path}
 1045:                     end,
 1046:     SQLFile = filename:join([BaseDir, "sql", File]),
 1047:     CreationQueries = read_sql_queries(SQLFile),
 1048:     ClearTableQueries = clear_table_queries(CreationQueries),
 1049:     case ejabberd_sql:sql_transaction(
 1050:            VHost, ClearTableQueries) of
 1051:         {atomic, ok} ->
 1052:             ok;
 1053:         Err ->
 1054:             ct:fail({failed_to_clear_sql_tables, Type, Err})
 1055:     end.
 1056: 
 1057: read_sql_queries(File) ->
 1058:     case file:open(File, [read, binary]) of
 1059:         {ok, Fd} ->
 1060:             read_lines(Fd, File, []);
 1061:         Err ->
 1062:             ct:fail({open_file_failed, File, Err})
 1063:     end.
 1064: 
 1065: clear_table_queries(Queries) ->
 1066:     lists:foldl(
 1067:       fun(Query, Acc) ->
 1068:               case split(str:to_lower(Query)) of
 1069:                   [<<"create">>, <<"table">>, Table|_] ->
 1070:                       [<<"DELETE FROM ", Table/binary, ";">>|Acc];
 1071:                   _ ->
 1072:                       Acc
 1073:               end
 1074:       end, [], Queries).
 1075: 
 1076: read_lines(Fd, File, Acc) ->
 1077:     case file:read_line(Fd) of
 1078:         {ok, Line} ->
 1079:             NewAcc = case str:strip(str:strip(Line, both, $\r), both, $\n) of
 1080:                          <<"--", _/binary>> ->
 1081:                              Acc;
 1082:                          <<>> ->
 1083:                              Acc;
 1084:                          _ ->
 1085:                              [Line|Acc]
 1086:                      end,
 1087:             read_lines(Fd, File, NewAcc);
 1088:         eof ->
 1089:             QueryList = str:tokens(list_to_binary(lists:reverse(Acc)), <<";">>),
 1090:             lists:flatmap(
 1091:               fun(Query) ->
 1092:                       case str:strip(str:strip(Query, both, $\r), both, $\n) of
 1093:                           <<>> ->
 1094:                               [];
 1095:                           Q ->
 1096:                               [<<Q/binary, $;>>]
 1097:                       end
 1098:               end, QueryList);
 1099:         {error, _} = Err ->
 1100:             ct:fail({read_file_failed, File, Err})
 1101:     end.
 1102: 
 1103: split(Data) ->
 1104:     lists:filter(
 1105:       fun(<<>>) ->
 1106:               false;
 1107:          (_) ->
 1108:               true
 1109:       end, re:split(Data, <<"\s">>)).
